3: With a slash from Lucia, the last Corrupted in front of her falls as well.
We've cleared the area. It's now safe to search.
You reconvene after investigating for quite some time.
Sorry... I didn't find any useful leads...
Same here. However, some projections appeared when I was looking for clues regarding the farewell letter.
Looks like two people read the full note. When they did, they cheered and went to the location to look for it.
The timestamp was too blurry to identify. Seems like it was a long time ago.
Even after all this time, there still hasn't been any news on how to control the Punishing Virus...
In other words, they may have run into danger, or it may have been completely useless information.
I saw a large number of scavengers devoured by the Red Tide.
They seemed almost enthralled by it as if they were doing it willingly.
I only saw this brief moment. I don't have any other information.
We'll keep an eye out. Let's keep going, Commandant.
